pages.text: Equipped alongside a Geats Rider's transformation device to transform into that Rider$(br2)Drops from:$(li)$(l:geats/mobs/jyamatorider)Jyamato Rider$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:geats/mobs/gmrider)GM Rider$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:geats/mobs/glare)Kamen Rider Glare$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:geats/mobs/gazer)Kamen Rider Gazer$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:geats/mobs/glare2)Kamen Rider Glare2$(/l)'s equipment$(li)$(l:geats/mobs/the_end_rider)The End Rider$(/l)'s equipment
